name: Quick and Easy Root Beer
author: Carla B.
summary: This is a fast, easy way to make homemade root beer.  Rather than fermenting it yourself, you can take a shortcut using carbonated water (club soda).
ingredients: 3 cups white sugar, or to taste
directions: Mix the water and sugar together in a saucepan, and bring to a boil
Reduce heat to a simmer, and stir until the sugar has dissolved
Stir in the root beer extract, and allow to cool for about 15 minutes
Pour the root beer mixture into a 1-gallon pitcher or bottle, and slowly pour in the carbonated water
Refrigerate until cold; serve over ice
